overview: When an egocentric, self-professed writer, director, artist and playboy is cut off by his parents, he concocts a plan to run an ad for a hot female roommate and charge her 80% of the rent. But when he falls for one of the applicants, he tries to turn his life around.
tagline: Bruce is an a**hole. And, every a**hole has his day.
title: BRUCE!!!
